程序包 Jest

类 Normal

java.lang.Object
Jest.Normal
所有已实现的接口:
Level
public class Normal
extends java.lang.Object
implements Level
The interface Normal is a part of the design pattern Strategy, it implements the interface Level Inside the interface, the two functions will be implemented.

  • 方法详细资料

    • StrategyOffer

      public void StrategyOffer​(VirtualPlayer vp)
      The virtual player makes offers. In the easy level, the virtual player face up the one of the two cards randomly to other players.
      指定者:
      StrategyOffer 在接口中 Level
      参数:
      vp - is the virtual player who makes offers.

    • StrategyTake

      public Player StrategyTake​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers, VirtualPlayer vp)
      The virtual player takes offer. In the easy level, for all the available offers, the virtual player take one randomly.
      指定者:
      StrategyTake 在接口中 Level
      参数:
      offeredPlayers - is the list of players from whom the virtual player can take offer.
      vp - is the virtual player who takes offers
      返回:
      type of Player who will be the next player to take offers.
